definition: to avoid/to shun/to flee/to escape/to keep away from/to leave/to hide from
ring/hoop/loop/(chain) link/classifier for scores in archery etc/to surround/to encircle/to hem in

sentences.english: She had friends on IUDs so she chose that option.
sentences.chinese: 她的朋友使用避孕環，所以她選了這個選項。

sentences.english: Last week, Riley got a new IUD.
sentences.chinese: 上週，Riley使用了一個新的避孕環。

sentences.english: An intrauterine device, but I'm told the pill is more effective than other contraceptives.
sentences.chinese: 放過避孕環，但我聽說口服避孕藥比其它方法更有效。
